editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

ios.subtitle: More A Little to the Left!

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

editorialNotes.standard: Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, youll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. Its a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwos adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible

ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Movings a drag!Relocate tothis satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

ios.subtitle: Trickier A Little to the Left

editorialNotes.standard: After a long day at work, its bath time! But Swampys shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

editorialNotes.tagline: Jump in and save the ninjas!

editorialNotes.standard: When dinosaurs collide with LEGO bricks, you dont have to be Mr. DNA to know the result is pure fun. Starring characters and creatures from all four Jurassic Park movies, this fantastic adventure lets you relive your favorite moments from the series and even create new ones with your own custom dinos. Full of all the humor, action, and surprises you expect, its a wacky team-up of T-Rex proportions.

ios.subtitle: Puzzle RPG: Return of the King

editorialNotes.standard: In reimagining the classic Tomb Raider games, Square Enix built a turn-based puzzler thats both true to its roots and completely fresh. This Apple Design Award winner pairs a gorgeous art style with super-fun gameplay where you avoid traps and collect relics. The experience feels so perfect for iOS, it was also our 2015 iPhone Game of the Year.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little boo in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.

You might get stuck the first time you play Gorogoa. But once the gears of your brain settle into the right configurations, youll see how smart this mix of art and perspective really is. Layers pile upon layers, doors transport you between realities, strange creatures and wild environments blend together into a fascinating interactive collage youll want to peel apart to discover what lies underneath.

editorialNotes.short: Geneva Hodgson: Story editor, Donut County
editorialNotes.tagline: How deep does this hole go?

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldnt wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beautyand this sequel didnt let us down. With its striking colours and level design, its even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what well remember most, thoughtheir relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: An unforgettable adventure full of challenging puzzles and gorgeous visuals.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: It might be time to use your fireplace.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream

editorialNotes.short: Brilliant puzzle designs and a haunting atmosphere make this unforgettable
editorialNotes.standard: Now heres how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this seriesits chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles and beautiful visualswhile making masterful enhancements. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.
Flow like water while manipulating mountains and valleys to coax a stream to riverhood.

A fascinating reinvention of a longtime videogame franchise, Hitman GO takes familiar elements of stealth and assassination and reinterprets them as a wondrously stylised, turn-based boardgame. Each mission presents characters and scenessome from previous Hitman gamesas a sleek diorama, blending old and new to create an innovative experience. Even with helpful distractions and places to hide, inching toward your targets a step at a time demands keen strategy, and trying to pull off optional mission objectives quickly becomes an irresistible obsession.

FEZ begins with a simple idea: you can rotate the world. The more you play, the more you understand this concepts far-reaching implications as you jump between ledges and rotate perspective to get pieces of the world to align. The complexity and sophistication of the puzzles keeps growing, building on ideas and forcing you to think in new ways. FEZ is perfect for anyone who loves scouring every little corner of virtual spaces for hidden secrets.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The enchantingly eccentric Rusty Lake series heads underground! Solve strange puzzles in train stations representing different eras of a womans life.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, its as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vincis gadgetry in this escape room puzzle series fantastic conclusion.

When young astronaut Kosmo sees his robot girlfriend, Nova, blown to pieces before his eyes, he gallantly sets off across the galaxy to find his beloveds parts and put her back together. This beautiful and whimsical point-and-click adventure will steal your heart as you visit dozens of kooky planets and encounter everything from alien arcades to robot discos. Each unique world introduces adorable critters, fantastic sights, clever puzzles to solve and tokens of affection to discover. Star-crossed romance has never felt so rewarding.

If you can doodle, you can play this one-of-a-kind Apple Design Award winner. Just draw a lineany lineand watch it spring to life across the screen, following your gestures to collect coloured dots and avoid black holes. But as the holes form increasingly elaborate obstacles, only the most ingenious doodles will do. With endless solutions to every challenge, its a stylish, supremely satisfying test of your creativity and puzzle-solving prowess.

The studio behind Blek has created another amazing puzzle game that evolves into fascinating forms. Theres always something new to learn and youll be challenged to consider all angles of these smartly designed levels. With beautiful minimalist visuals and enchanting sound, Frost artfully engages body and mind.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Beautiful, challenging, and always inventive - these brilliant puzzles will really test you.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: A delightfully daft murder mystery, from the masters of the genre.
Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.
Explore a vivid world filled with remarkable style and attention to detail.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Well never forget ascending a mysterious tower with the help of a pet-like friend in this wordless point-and-click adventure about cooperation and personal purpose.
